meanings.sent1: The annattos provide shade and beauty in the tropical forest.
meanings.sent2: I learned about the annattos during our visit to the botanical garden.
meanings.sent3: The monkeys love to climb the annattos and play hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: The annattos stand tall like guardians of the rainforest.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green leaves of the annattos rustled in the breeze.

meanings.definition: The red seeds of this tree, used as a coloring agent in food.
meanings.sent1: The chef added annattos to the stew for a rich red color.
meanings.sent2: I spotted annattos in the market while shopping for spices.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they pretended the annattos were magical rubies.
meanings.sent4: The artist's palette included the bright hue of annattos for painting.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the cooking annattos filled the kitchen with warmth.
